patterns: alternatives to Almond for Nut Allergy people?
responses: The symptoms of Nut Allergy may include Swelling, itching, hives, difficulty breathing, anaphylaxis
To manage Nut Allergy, you can Avoid almonds and products containing almonds. Carry an epinephrine auto-injector for emergencies.
For people with Nut Allergy, alternatives to Almond include such seeds as sunflower, pumpkin and winter squash
The symptoms of Oral Allergy Syndrome may include Itchy mouth, scratchy throat, swollen lips, oral discomfort
To manage Oral Allergy Syndrome, you can Cooking or peeling apples may reduce allergic reactions. Avoid consuming raw apples.
For people with Oral Allergy Syndrome, alternatives to Apple include papaya,kiwi,oranges
The symptoms of Stone Fruit Allergy may include Swelling, itching, hives, digestive discomfort
To manage Stone Fruit Allergy, you can Avoid apricots and other stone fruits such as peaches and plums.
For people with Stone Fruit Allergy, alternatives to Apricot includes Orange,banana,mango

Are there any alternatives to Butter for people with Milk allergy / Lactose intolerance?
responses: The symptoms of Milk allergy / Lactose intolerance may cause Abdominal pain, bloating, diarrhea, skin rash
To manage Milk allergy / Lactose intolerance, you can Avoid butter and dairy products. Choose lactose-free alternatives like almonds milk,soya milk,coconut milk.
For people with Milk allergy / Lactose intolerance, alternatives to dairy Butter
The symptoms of Gluten Allergy may include...Abdominal pain, bloating, diarrhea, fatigue
To manage Gluten Allergy, you can Avoid barley and products containing gluten. Choose gluten-free alternatives.
For people with Gluten Allergy, alternatives to Barley include Buckwheat and quinoa
